title: [Upper Dragonsclaw, Winding Path]
description: Towering pines cling precariously to the mountainside along this twisted trail.  Shadows dance and flicker over the branches, and a large tower looms in the distant sky.
Towering pines cling precariously to the mountainside along this twisted trail.  Rays of moonlight dance and flicker over the branches, and a large tower looms silhouetted in the distant night sky.
